reviews.review: Ein tolles Knobelspiel, stellenweise ganz schön fordernde Rätsel, bisher bin ich aber ohne Lösungshilfe durchgekommen.
играю с восьми лет, щас мне 11, и помойму это лучшая игра от valve
this is most definitely an amazing game, and one every gamer should experience.
Uno de los mejores juegos de la historia. Valve lo ha vuelto a hacer.
Criativo, intuitivo, curva de aprendizado perfeita, história interessante, e traz ótimas sensações quando consigo resolver os puzzles. Definitivamente um dos melhores jogos que já joguei.
GLaDOS is one sassy little bi***
Mejor y más largo que el 1
It is a really fun puzzle game but you need help with some videos to get past some chambers

非常经典游戏，游戏库必备，买就完了！！

O kadar efsane bir oyunki anlatılmaz yaşanır dicem ama yaşanmaz oynanır . Hele hele 2 kişi birlikte oynadığınızda bambaşka oluyor , oyundaki görevleri bir yana bırakıp salak saçma ama bir o kadarda eğlenceli şeyler yapmak ta vaztgeçilmez bir deneyim bu oyunu sonuna kadar tavsiye ederim . Ücretide çok uygun 18,5 lira nedir ki?...

Игра годная, особенно приятно играть с другом в кооператив
很棒的游戏...呕...当初3块钱买回来时没想到会这么有意思...第一次玩建议不看攻略，自行探索非常有趣...呕...就是有亿点点晕，治好我的不晕3D症...半小时上头一小时孕吐......朋友玩吐后就剩我一个玩单人模式了...呕...呕......我还可以...
Топовая игра все советаю хорошая физика
Классная игра, с хорошим сюжет продолжающим 1 часть. Можно играть в сюжетку одному или с другом в паре проходить другой сюжет

Best game ever!!!
How could a game be this fun! The co-op mode is the best. The whole game is so well made!
Great job keep up the good work valve!
loved it till the end, played this with my gf, I wish there was more of it but steam cant count to 3 /:

Топовый саундтрек, графика которая выглядит круто и для наших времён, интересный сюжет, мультиплеер, возможность создавать свои головоломки и шутки от гладос
10 синих и оранжевых дырочек из 10
its a classic! guaranteed good time.

This game has always been awesome and going back to it felt damn good! Crashing through the depths of Aperture Science in a puzzle/getaway/chase with a mean spirited potato is a wonderful distraction.
You might even make friends with old enemies... like a box and a turret.

basically the best game ever made

10/10 goes in the hall of fame
I loved playing this game it super fun and has an amazing story

this. is. amazing! i love the fact that there is an online thing now so you can play with other people. def check this game out, even more so if you played and finshed the first one. some of the story might be confusing, so try out thr first one before this one.
9 years late but still 11/10. This game fried my brain more than exams, it´s amazing and great storyline. Both single player and coop are awesome. Definitely loved GLaDOS' song.
one of the best games i've ever played
best portal game out of the 2
Good visuals, fun puzzles, and good story. 10/10
One of the best Puzzle games I've ever played.
The end is the best thing ;-;
Successor to Portal, Portal 2 is another one of those great games that everyone should play. Continues and builds right off of the Portal 1 story, so play that first (no cheating). Also: Co-op. yes.
I S   G O O D

This game is one of the most perfect sequels of all time. It captures all the elements of the original game perfectly and adds tons more fun stuff. However, i feel like the area of the game in the old Aperture science was a bit too long and kind of bored me after a while. On the other hand, that part it teaches you some new ideas like gel and gives HUGE lore heavy moments which i quite liked. In the first game, i loved how in the escape phase i could look into the test chambers i completed and it gave me a sense of not being where i was supposed to be, like i was in control instead of GLaDOS.
Absolutely Recommended to play. Loads of fun and brain intensity !!
I've played this game at least 20 times, yet the graphics amaze me every time.

literally the best game ever.  every other game is rated x/Portal 2 with Portal 2 being the highest yet unachievable rating.  If you are making a game, this is your goal.  If you have not played Portal 2, you are missing out on the accumulation of ~7-9 million years of human achievement all in one game.  Being born in this time period is a blessing because you have a chance to play this game.

dis game is a good puzzel game i really like it
ITS FUN
VRAIMENT EXCELLENT j'y joue tout les ans et je m'y lasse jamais vraiment c'est une pépite

kiedy grałem w pierwszą część portala to było mi przykro  dlatego że gra się tak szybko skończyła i nie było nic poza testami i ucieczką, więc liczyłem że w portal 2 będzie coś więcej. I nie zawiodłem się: ta gra to nie same monotonne przechodzenie testów ale także fabuła w portalu jest bardzo ciekawa i są dodatkowe opcje jak gra ze znajomym lub tworzenie własnych poziomów. Zdecydowanie każdemu polecam tą grę.

Ademas de jugarlo me trajo nostalgia:)
